name: 林鈞陶
objective: 此課程主要探討現代機率基本知識，包含以下主題: 機率空間；隨機變數；期望值與慣矩；聯合分佈隨機變數；慣矩母函數；中央極限定理。
schedule:
Week 1-2: Introduction to Probability (機率簡介).
Week 3: Random Variables (隨機變數).
Week 4-7: Discrete Random Variables (離散隨機變數).
Week 8: Continuous Random Variables (連續隨機變數).
Week 9: Midterm (期中考).
Week 10-11: Continuous Random Variables (連續隨機變數).
Week 12-14: Multiple Random Variables (多維隨機變數).
Week 15-16: Sums of Random Variables (隨機變數之和).
Week 17: Central Limited Theory (中央極限定理).
Week 18: Final Exam (期末考).
scorePolicy:
Quizzes (小考) 30%
Midterm (期中考) 30%
Final (期末考) 30%
Others (其他如平時表現) 10%
materials:
1. Probability and Stochastic Processes (by Yates, 3rd Edition)
2. Slides
